name: d3fc-label-layout
description: A D3 layout that places labels avoiding overlaps using either a greedy or simulated annealing strategy

scripts.bundle: rimraf build && rollup -c && uglifyjs build/d3fc-label-layout.js --compress --mangle -o build/d3fc-label-layout.min.js
scripts.test: npm run bundle && eslint index.js src/**/*.js test/**/*.js && jasmine JASMINE_CONFIG_PATH=test/support/jasmine.json
scripts.semantic-release: semantic-release pre && npm publish && semantic-release post
scripts.site: npm run test && mkdirp site/lib && ncp build/d3fc-label-layout.js site/lib/d3fc-label-layout.js
scripts.dev: npm run site && watch -p '{src,test}/**/*.js' -c 'npm run site'
